alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:23AM MST until January 30 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting up to 45 mph. Visibility could be reduced to under one half mile at times. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. A brief lull in snowfall is possible Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
